songs.lyrics:
[Hook]
Tell me what you wanna do
Cause we can do that soon as your ass come on through
We can do that all day too
Alright tell me what you wanna do
Cause we can do that

[Verse 1]
Cadillac with the sun roof hanging out the motherfucker like "who is him?"
Ah baby that's DRAM
Matter of fact he's stepping your bitch with chest hair spitting game smooth as silk
What type of shit he on?
I'm on molly, I'm on motherfucking tree
I don't know how to motherfucking believe in love
I got me all in a zone
I'm in a body
Not fucking with the Bugatti
I brought my liquor on my own
It's in the car baby

[Interlude]
Girl 1 - What's the matter is he drunk?
Girl 2 - Yeah he drunk

[Hook]
Tell me what you wanna do
Cause we can do that soon as your ass come on through
We can do that all day too
Alright tell me what you wanna do
Cause we can do that

[Verse 2]
Long print silk with the chest hairs out
Circle I rest with these golds in my mouth
I fuck with (?) for keeping hoes in they house
It's a fucking bachelor pad, it's what it's supposed to be bout
I be chilling at my cuz spot high as a fool
In this little back room and the light bulb dull
And I ain't Young Thug but I'ma ask for the hookah
I'ma be geriatric, still coughing off buddha
With a kango hat and the (?) real cute
With the old school jewelry and the tear drop booty
Baby when I do ya, I'ma do ya
When we screwing you gon' think there was a dick in your medulla
That's a mind fuck
I wish that I could stay baby but time is up
Ya gotta go, ya gotta go, soon as I nut
Sike, nah you gon' get the round two of this
Finger tips, take a lick your booty, pussy lips
You put it on a crucifix, got resurrected with your baby
If I want it on your face, I wonder if you'd let me
I wonder if I (?) she didn't tell me
Well either way they call me D.R.A.M. but you can call me Shelly
Either way they call me D.R.A.M. but you can call me Shelly
Friends ain't ya, friends

[Hook]
Tell me what you wanna do
Cause we can do that soon as your ass come on through
We can do that all day too
Alright tell me what you wanna do
Cause we can do that

[Outro]
For the summer, for the summer, oh
Oh-ohhh, haha, I said oh-ohhhhh
Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah
Hah, oh-ohh-ohhhh-ohhhh
songs.title: Get Money
